Technique: FORMED ON THE POTTER'S WHEEL; GROUND; ENGOBE; PAINTED
Name: Cylix
Description: Cylix with straight rim, curved walls and bottom with solid foot. Orangey-coloured paste. The surface has been smoothened and shows some remnants of its orangey-coloured coating. The exterior, in the higher part of the body, presents a decoration consisting of an undulating horizontal stem with lanceolate leaves, painted in black, of a hellenizing style.
